ROOT:
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE CATEGORYID IN(SELECT CATEGORYID FROM CATEGORIES WHERE CATEGORYID IN(SELECT CATEGORYID FROM CATEGORIES WHERE CATEGORYID IS NOT NULLCATEGORYID IS NULL) AND CATEGORYID IS NOT NULLAND CATEGORYID IS NULL) AND CATEGORYID IS NOT NULLAND CATEGORYID IS NULL AND CATEGORYID IN(@PLIST) AND UnitPrice = @up AND UnitsInStock = @uis AND UnitsOnOrder = @uoo AND ReOrderLevel = @rol AND DISCONTINUED = @bit ORDER BY []
ISNOTNULL1, Boolean, true
ISNOTNULL2, Boolean, true
ISNOTNULL3, Boolean, true
PLIST, Byte, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8
up, Decimal, 28.5
uis, Int32, 113
uoo, Int32, 0
rol, Int32, 25
bit, Boolean, false
COLUMN, SUPPLIERID
SEQUENCE, DESC
